com.communote.plugins.core.views

Class ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.plugins.core.views.ViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginViewController, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdministrationViewController, BookmarkletController, EmbedController, EmbedMessengerController, WidgetViewController

    public abstract class ViewController
extends Object
implements org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller, PluginViewController
    Wrapper for controllers. Subclasses must override one of the do HTTP_METHOD methods or the handleRequest for something to happen.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
